articles.title: Cowboys, Patriots Poised to Lose Most Money If No Fans at Games in 2020 - KFH
articles.description: According to stadium revenue data collected by Mike Ozanian of Forbes, the Cowboys and the Patriots sit atop the list of teams that could lose the most if there are no fans allowed at games in 2020.
articles.content:
